name: 1688 主页搜索框检查测试
description: 检查主页搜索框状态，为自然搜索做准备

config.script: console.log('🔍 开始检查1688主页搜索框...'); const searchBox = document.querySelector('#q'); console.log('搜索框元素:', searchBox); if (searchBox) { console.log('搜索框占位符:', searchBox.placeholder); console.log('搜索框是否可见:', searchBox.offsetWidth > 0 && searchBox.offsetHeight > 0); const searchButton = document.querySelector('.search-btn, [class*="search"]'); console.log('搜索按钮元素:', searchButton); return { success: true, searchBox: { found: true, placeholder: searchBox.placeholder, visible: searchBox.offsetWidth > 0 && searchBox.offsetHeight > 0, value: searchBox.value }, searchButton: { found: !!searchButton, text: searchButton ? searchButton.textContent.trim() : null, visible: searchButton ? (searchButton.offsetWidth > 0 && searchButton.offsetHeight > 0) : false }, pageTitle: document.title, pageUrl: window.location.href }; } else { console.log('❌ 未找到搜索框'); const alternativeSelectors = ['input[name="keywords"]', 'input[type="search"]', '.search-input', '[class*="search"] input']; let foundAlternative = false; for (const selector of alternativeSelectors) { const element = document.querySelector(selector); if (element) { console.log('找到替代搜索框:', selector, element); foundAlternative = true; break; } } return { success: false, searchBox: { found: false }, searchButton: { found: false }, pageTitle: document.title, pageUrl: window.location.href, alternativeFound: foundAlternative }; }
